name: Sorcerer Dungeon
description:
You are a tiny sorcerer and nobody knows why you are in that strange dungeon,  but you can use magic to beat all the enemies. Hold on and try to survive so many rounds as you can. Good luck!

There are potions and teleporters also!

The  popup of the information of the controls isn't working so i will write them here temporarily. This is because of the fact that  i'm currently working in this project and this is the first version which can be played. I'm creating the music and improving the game. The final version will be released soon!

WASD: Movement

Shift: Sprint

Space Bar: Shoot magic projectiles

Intro: Accept Dialogs

Esc: Pause

This game is written in Java without using any library or framework. I have developed this project in Java becouse I wanted to show you that a game may be created from scratch :)

Version: alpha 1.0 Licence: CC0
